mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.series_id AS natrualkey, a.series_name AS name, a.area_id AS areaId, b.area_name AS areaName, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.remark AS remark
mapper.select:
select
FROM t_jc_series a,t_jc_area b WHERE a.series_id =#{natrualkey} and a.area_id = b.area_id limit 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_jc_series where del_flag=0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_jc_series a,t_jc_area b WHERE a.del_flag=0 and a.area_id = b.area_id
and ( a.series_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or a.series_id like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or b.area_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or a.remark like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
select case when series_id is NULL then 0 else series_id end from t_jc_series ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

select series_id AS natrualkey, series_name AS name from t_jc_series where del_flag=0
and upper(series_name) like concat('%',#{name},'%')
